author: Cat Bussell
description:
Next Saturday, June 14, will see the Warhammer 40k Kill Team: Typhon box set go up for pre-order at last - packing a team of AdMech battle servitors playing second fiddle to some spectacular new Tyranid Raveners, the best new 'Nids we've seen since the bulk of the new range deployed with 10th edition in 2023.

Continue reading Warhammer 40k's Kill Team Typhon hits preorder this week, full of new Tyranids
MORE FROM WARGAMER: Best Warhammer 40k starter sets, Best Warhammer 40k games, All Warhammer 40k factions
title: Warhammer 40k's Kill Team Typhon hits preorder this week, full of new Tyranids

author: Gab Hernandez
description:
It’s no secret that spellcasters are some of the most powerful figures in DnD.  Shaping reality to one’s whim does tend to give people a bit of a god complex. However, even the mightiest level 20 casters are limited by their action economy. After all, it would be broken if casters could cast more than one spell in a single turn, right? RIGHT?

Continue reading You can cast spells twice in one turn in DnD, but there's a catch
MORE FROM WARGAMER: DnD 2024 Player's Handbook review, DnD classes guide, DnD races guide
title: You can cast spells twice in one turn in DnD, but there's a catch

author: Cat Bussell
description:
OK, yes, Magic: The Gathering can be notoriously expensive - blame Wizards of the Coast for setting the prices and all of us for paying them. But, while war never changes, prices do - and as of this weekend, the Fallout Commander Deck Bundle is finally available at a discount from Amazon US!

Continue reading Grab the MTG Fallout Commander Deck Bundle with its best discount in ages
MORE FROM WARGAMER: All MTG sets in order, Upcoming MTG release dates, How to play MTG
title: Grab the MTG Fallout Commander Deck Bundle with its best discount in ages

author: Gab Hernandez
description:
The role of the humble (or let’s face it, all-powerful) Dungeon Master is to craft DnD adventures that will make any party eager for more. However, with so many moving parts in a campaign, busy DMs and GMs may find it difficult to give their adventures more flavor. Fortunately, resources abound to help - including this RPG Game Master Book Bundle, which gives you 11 entire books full of game running resources, with a whopping 90% off and a charity donation built in!

Continue reading Get 90% off a suite of 11 DnD DM books packed with NPCs, puzzles, and villains
MORE FROM WARGAMER: DnD 2024 Player's Handbook review, DnD classes guide, DnD races guide
title: Get 90% off a suite of 11 DnD DM books packed with NPCs, puzzles, and villains
